comments:
I20050420

- Have this code:

public class ExtractConstArray {
	Object foo() {
		return new char[0];
	}
	Object bar() {
		return new char[0];
	}
}

- select the array creation expression
- choose Refactor>Extract Constant

> Internal error, stack trace not available
